item.title: [request/help] dialogue
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

I Vain I:

Trigger the teleport for the yes option, and close the interface for the text String for the no option.

where should i trigger the teleport? i guess in clickingmost.java but idk what case it will be then. also, i got some errors if i added the dialogue and do it to my object.
my object code:

if(objectID == 1805) { //champions guild door if(combatLevel == 126) { NpcDialogueSend = 124; toX = 3191; toY = 3362; } else { sM("You don't have a combat level of 126"); } }

errors:

client.java:15304: incompatible types found : int required: boolean NpcDialogueSend = 124; ^ client.java:18720: talk2(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,int) in client cannot be applied to (java.lang.String,int) talk2("oh, i see you have a combat level of 126" , 198); ^ client.java:18723: talk2(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,int) in client cannot be applied to (java.lang.String,int) talk2("Do you want to enter the champions guild? ", 198); ^ client.java:18726: choice(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) in client cannot be applied to (java.lang.String,java.lang.String,int) choice("yes." , "no.", 198); ^ 4 errors Finished! Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

item.title: [request/help] dialogue
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

well i maded a dialogue but it needs to start when someone click on that object. also i don’t know how i can let the options do something. can someone help me plz?
evolutionX v5 source

here is the dialogue.

case 124: talk("hello, i am the champions guild", 198); break; case 125: talk2("oh, i see you have a combat level of 126", 198); break; case 126: talk2("Do you want to enter the champions guild?", 198); break; case 127: choice("yes." , "no.", 198);
